content.query:
SET ANSI_NULLS ON
GO
SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON
GO

CREATE TABLE [stage].[ClaimsFraudSummarystage]
( 
	[output_label1] [int]  NULL,
	[ClaimFIRNo] [varchar](20)  NULL,
	[ClaimType] [varchar](13)  NULL,
	[HospitalizationType] [varchar](10)  NULL,
	[Class_of_Accommodation] [varchar](50)  NULL,
	[Procedure] [varchar](500)  NULL,
	[Diagnosis] [varchar](250)  NULL,
	[policyNo] [varchar](100)  NULL,
	[PolicyType] [varchar](17)  NULL,
	[member_code] [varchar](25)  NULL,
	[FullMemberName] [varchar](200)  NULL,
	[Gender] [varchar](6)  NULL,
	[Age] [varchar](20)  NULL,
	[Hospital] [varchar](100)  NULL,
	[Corporate] [varchar](100)  NULL,
	[LengthofStay] [varchar](5)  NULL,
	[IsFraudClaim] [varchar](1)  NULL,
	[FraudScore] [varchar](10)  NULL,
	[ClaimAmount] [varchar](20)  NULL,
	[ClaimDate] [varchar](20)  NULL
)
WITH
(
	DISTRIBUTION = ROUND_ROBIN,
	CLUSTERED COLUMNSTORE INDEX
)
GO
